website_summaries.verdict: Nier: Automata is a match made in heaven, blending the zany tragedy of Yoko Taro's storytelling with Platinum Games' high-energy gameplay. Unfortunately, the PC port suffers from performance problems.
pros: Solid action gameplay, with fun customization, engaging enemies and open world exploration
Great longevity thanks to multiple playable characters and alternate stories
cons: No official improvement patch in sight

customer_reviews.title: I love this game... On PS4
customer_reviews.text: It’s been over 14 months and this game is still broken. Poor frame rate, screen tearing and texture issues and I’m running this game on my 1070ti. Cannot even do 1080/60 FPS. I hear there’s some mods that fix these issues so have at it if mods are your thing. Even if this game is on deep discount I’d stay away until Square Enix patch these issues which is looking like that’ll never happen. PS4 version is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: KmyJelly

customer_reviews.title: Imperfect PC port, but easily fixable
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is fantastic and is well worth playing for anyone even vaguely interested in it. I was worried, however, about the quality of the port (which, to be fair, is lacking). However, there is a totally free and easy to install fan-made patch (called FAR) which, in my experience, made the game run almost perfectly. But seriously, Nier:Automata is so good that even with having to install a community patch and tinkering around a bit with settings it's still an easy 5-star game. PC specs: win 10, i7-4790k processor, GTX 1050, 16 GB RAM.

product_meta.title: NieR: Automata [Online Game Code]
product_meta.description:
Platform:PC Online Game Code| Edition:Standard

NieR:Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 and their battle to reclaim the machine-driven dystopia overrun by powerful machines.

Humanity has been driven from the Earth by mechanical beings from another world. In a final effort to take back the planet, the human resistance sends a force of android soldiers to destroy the invaders. Now, a war between machines and androids rages on... A war that could soon unveil a long-forgotten truth of the world.NieR: Automata is a new third-person action RPG follow-up to the 2010 cult hit, NieR. Offering a fresh blend of action and RPG gameplay styles, NieR New Project is currently being developed in collaboration with PlatinumGames, the studio known for its groundbreaking advancements in the action genre.

The game’s all-star development team is helmed by producer Yosuke Saito, known for his work on DRAGON QUEST X and NieR. The previous game’s director, YOKO TARO returns for the new project as well as composer Keiichi Okabe, whose award-winning score to the original became one of the greatest accomplishments in gaming music.

New to the series is character designer Akihiko Yoshida from CyDesignation, Inc., well known for his work in BRAVELY DEFAULT and the FINAL FANTASY series, as well as game designer Takahisa Taura, with Metal Gear Rising: Revengence to his credit.
